title: Average Place
review: Bhim Burj and Garbha Gunjan is on Taragarh Fort. The structure is a stone tower in the Fort. There are water reservoirs near this site.

title: An Average Place
review: Bhim Burj and Garbha Gunjan are located in Taragarh Fort. Garbha Gunjan is a large cannon that was housed under the Bhim Burj. The structure is a stone tower in the Fort. There are water reservoirs near this site. The structure is of 16th century and well known of it's time. You will get a panoramic view of city from here.However the entire place and area requires major repairing. An average visit and can be avoided.

title: Average
review: Bhim Burj and Garbha Gunjan is average going place. it is located in Taragarh Ajmer. This is a historical place.

title: Must See
review: Bhim Burj and Garbha Gunjan are located within the Taragarh fort. Garbha Gunjan is a cannon that was housed under the Buim Burj. This structure is a stone tower within the precincts of the fort.

title: In Taraghar fort
review: Bhim burj and garbha gunjan is located in taraghar fort. this is nice place to see . Beautiful place.

title: Taraghar Fort complex
review: This is one of the buildings inside Taraghar fort so you can see it along with Bhim Burj and Garbha Gunjan. But not for the summers, We were a couple and by the end of the tour we were famished! Not for the faint hearted.

title: Nothing special
review: Nothing special, like generally in Taragarh with all buildings included in the complex. Well, a large cannon called Garbh Gunjam  (Thunder from the Womb)  seems to be according to its size the second in India. Well, wide stone bastion tower. Well, the water tanks. Looks like some kind of decorations for the Fort, nothing more. Only good views of the entire trough near the mountain ridge of Aravali, in which are located Ajmer and Pushkar.

title: Nice but need energy
review: This place is nice but Taragarh fort itself wants a lot of energy from you as the top of the hill it is too hot in afternoon.

title: Nice architecture on the top
review: This place is nice and at the top of the hill. Best time to visit is during sun-set as the view this time is lovely.
